2577B2B4.Mod1_Description: {c_important}Blight{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%|]{/c} chance to Immobilize enemies for {c_number}{buffduration:IMMOBILIZE}{/c} seconds on impact.

D618A933.Mod0_Description: You and your Minions deal {c_number}[{SF_18}*100|%x|]{/c} increased damage to enemies within {c_important}Blight{/c}.
